property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever this creature attacks, you may look at the top 3 cards of your deck. If you do, put one of them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard. {DORON GO} Shenton:When this creature is destroyed, you may put an exile creature that has "Shenton" in its name from your hand into the battle zone. ■ You can't put other exile creatures that have "Shen" in their name into the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Look at the top 5 cards of your deck. You may take a creature from among them, show that creature to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Then put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order. {CHARGER} (After you cast this spell, put it into your mana zone instead of your graveyard.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ This creature can't attack. ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may discard a card from your hand. If you do, search your deck. You may take a God from your deck, show that God to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone or whenever it attacks, you may destroy one of your creatures. If you do, your opponent chooses one of their creatures and destroys it. {DOUBLE BREAKER}

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy all non-Dragons. ■ Your opponent's Dragons can't attack.
